T02D2567:27a-0: @27a * // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2567:27a-1: / mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sgo nas dbang
T02D2567:27a-2: po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa ni
T02D2567:27a-3: / lhar bskyed pa stong pa nyid bcug nas sems
T02D2567:27a-4: rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa 'od gsal ba
T02D2567:27a-5: rgyu gang gis kyang ma bskyed pas /
T02D2567:27a-6: rkyen gang gis kyang mi 'jig / zhe 'dod thams
T02D2567:27b-0: cad dang @27b bral pa'i stong pa'i rgyas thebs pa'i
T02D2567:27b-1: shes pa de kho nal gnas pa ni chos kyi
T02D2567:27b-2: sku'o // shes pa'i ngo bo ma grub cing rig
T02D2567:27b-3: pa rang gsal gyi nyams myong dang ma bral ba
T02D2567:27b-4: ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o //
T02D2567:27b-5: shes pa gsal ba de nyid snang la rang bzhin med pas sprul pa'i sku'o //
T02D2567:27b-6: rgyu'i gnas skabs su sku gsum dbyer med bsgoms pas 'bras bu sku gsum thob ste /
T02D2567:27b-7: spangs pa dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi sku /
T02D2567:27b-8: sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' la mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku /
T02D2567:27b-9: rigs drug gi sems can gyi snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te /
T02D2567:27b-11: dbang po rab kyis de kho na nyid bsgom pa
